name: Connect4
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four connect
des: In connect 4 game, your objective is to get 4 checkers in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the game board before your opponent. In your turn, say a column number. in your opponent's turn, Say next.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
